content.query:
--muestra la cantidad de vehiculos electricos e hibridos
USE electric_vehicle_explorer;

SELECT
    electric_vehicle_type,
    COUNT(1) AS number_of_vehicle
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://entixcoviddl.dfs.core.windows.net/electric-vehicle-data/bronze/vehicle.csv',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) WITH (
    vehicheTypeId     SMALLINT 8
) AS vehicle
JOIN
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
    ) WITH(
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)       --util para utilizar OPENJSON
    )AS vehicle_type
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)   --une los valores de jsonDoc y los valores obtenidos del documento JSON enla matriz por OPENJSON
    WITH(
        vehicleType SMALLINT,
        electric_vehicle_type VARCHAR(50) '$.electricVehicleType'   --cambia el nombre de la columna
    )
    ON vehicle.vehicheTypeId = vehicleType
    GROUP BY electric_vehicle_type
    ORDER BY electric_vehicle_type
    ;
